generated_doNotEdit.title: Scared Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the a mob to become scared when the weather outside is thundering

fields.title: Sound Interval
fields.description: The interval in which a sound will play when active in a 1/delay chance to kick off

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
